scripts.build-prod: mkdir -p prod && cp dev/index.html prod/ && npm run css-build-prod && rm -rf dist && spago bundle-app --to prod/index.js && parcel build prod/index.html
scripts.css-build-prod: node-sass _sass/main.scss prod/css/main.css && postcss --use autoprefixer --output prod/css/main.css prod/css/main.css
